quote: I don’t need to sow any damn oats. What are you two, the supernatural version of Thelma and Louise?” “Hardly,” Talia scoffed. “This car is a classic. No way would I drive it off a cliff.
quote_letters: I DONT NEED TO SOW ANY DAMN OATS WHAT ARE YOU TWO THE SUPERNATURAL VERSION OF THELMA AND LOUISE HARDLY TALIA SCOFFED THIS CAR IS A CLASSIC NO WAY WOULD I DRIVE IT OFF A CLIFF
